summary: This document is an email chain from August 1, 2019, concerning a request for psychological notes on Jeffrey Epstein following his reported suicide attempt. The request is directed to the Chief Psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, and the exchange highlights a procedural issue regarding HIPAA authorization.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the requested psychological notes following a reported suicide attempt while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Request for Epstein's Psychological Notes
events.description: An initial request is made for psychological notes on Jeffrey Epstein regarding his suicide attempt.

events.title: HIPAA Authorization Inquiry
events.description: A follow-up email asks for clarification on who is authorized to receive the notes, citing the need for HIPAA compliance.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A request was made on July 31, 2019, for psychological notes on Jeffrey Epstein concerning his suicide attempt.
The request was directed to the Chief Psychologist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
A follow-up email on August 1, 2019, raised a procedural issue, stating 'We need a HIPAA' authorization before releasing the notes.
The document indicates official internal communication regarding Epstein's mental health status while in custody.
